Talk020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Evenin', kids! It's nice to seal ya!
Everyone sealin' good?
Talk021:
<sp:0:2:2:5000>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Woof. <sp:5:0:0>Fake it till you make it, I guess.<sp:5:0:0>
But it'll be worth it to see those kids
beaming with joy.<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk022:
<sp:0:2:2:5000>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Woof. <sp:5:0:0>I'll keep working on it until I can
say that without cringing.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now that that weirdo's not interrupting
me, I can start fresh. <sp:5:0:0>I'll practice smiling
until my cheeks hurt!
Talk03_0_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Y-you startled me! <sp:5:1:0>Give a gal some
warning next time!
Talk09_0:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>There's <clr:0000><sp:2:e:4a:440043006f006c006c006500630074004f0062006a006500630074005f004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f004d006100780047006f006f00640073004e0075006d00ffff00cd><clr:ffff> stuffed toys I need you to
gather up for me. Each and every one
was made with love, so be gentle.<sp:0:4:0>Or was there something else?
Talk08_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Aw, thanks! Well? Feeling confident?
Then get to it!
Talk09_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>If you bail before the job's done, I'm
gonna keep your <clr:0000>20 rupee <clr:ffff>deposit.<sp:5:1:0>
You sure you wanna quit?
Talk06_0:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, now you want to help?! <sp:5:0:0>Then start
picking them up and loading them on
the cart.<sp:0:4:0>I'll make you a deal. If you get all <clr:0000><sp:5:0:0><sp:2:e:4a:440043006f006c006c006500630074004f0062006a006500630074005f004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f004d006100780047006f006f00640073004e0075006d00ffff00cd> <clr:ffff>of
them for me, I'll pay you.<sp:0:4:0>But if you're serious about helping, I want
to see them all in that cart at the end.
Talk06_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, and you gotta be careful loading the
toys.<sp:5:0:0> They tend to fall out if they're not all
the way in.
Talk06_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I want to get moving, so make this quick,
OK? I'll be keeping track of time.
Talk53:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>You were trying to pull one over on me,
weren't you!<sp:0:4:0>Knock it off. <sp:5:0:0>These precious little plushes
are charity donations to kids!
Talk061_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>I wouldn't mind some help again. <sp:5:0:0>Load
them all for me and I'll pay you.
Talk061_5:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>I'm thinking I'll have you do it again.<sp:0:4:0>I mean, you didn't seem to have any
trouble picking them up last time. <sp:5:0:0>So you
can do it <clr:0000>even quicker than before<clr:ffff>, right?!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Of course I'll pay you for loading them all
for me.
Talk010:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>Was this NOT the way to
Hateno Village?<sp:0:4:0>I can't get lost now. Not after spending
all that time with the Gerudo dollmaker
learning to make <clr:0000>sand-seal plushes<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I refuse to give up on my dream of
handing these out to the schoolkids!
Talk03_1_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You again?! <sp:5:1:0>Seriously, can you please not
sneak up on me? <sp:5:1:0>It's bad for my heart.
Talk061_6:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>After an emotional-damages fee of <clr:0000>20
rupees<clr:ffff>, that is. <sp:5:0:0>You'll still do it, right?
Talk57:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Quit acting weird! I don't wanna have to
clean up after you again.
Talk012:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>I can't wait to see their faces light up
when I give them these stuffed toys.<sp:5:0:0>
Hope I can remember not to glare at 'em.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, I know! <sp:5:1:0>I should practice my routine
so I can hand out the toys with a smile.
Talk07_0:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Uh, hold on a sec.<sp:0:4:0>You're not thinking of pocketing any of
my seals, I hope. <sp:5:0:0>These are handmade.<sp:5:0:0>
For children.
Talk14_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'll get this smiling thing down. <sp:5:0:0>Eventually.<sp:5:0:0>
I hope. Anyway, I clearly need more
practice at it.<sp:0:4:0>So leave me alone, would you?
Talk07_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I said I'd pay you if you bring 'em back,
but this is kinda your fault, so...
Talk017:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>G-good evening, children! I'm the sand-
seal lady!
Talk07_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Mind giving me a <clr:0000>20 rupee <clr:ffff>deposit?
You'll get it back once you're done.
Talk018:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Mornin', kiddos! It's nice to seal ya!
Everyone sealin' good?
Talk11_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Happy>Nice work! <sp:5:0:0>I didn't think you'd manage
to load them all up in so short a time.
Talk019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Helloooooo, kiddies! It's nice to seal ya!
Everyone sealin' good?
Talk04_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>They're waterproof, so they should be
OK, but still...
Talk11_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>In fact, you did it even quicker than last
time. <sp:5:0:0>You're pretty good at this! <sp:5:0:0>I mean
thatâ€”you've been a huge help.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar>Hey, are you not done yet? This is taking
forever! <sp:5:0:0>I have places to be!
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>So yeah, here's your pay. Your deposit is
included in that.
Talk13: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Don't worry, I can pick up what's left.
Talk08_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Wow, really? It's just <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>...
Well, whatever. I can do it myself.
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>No way. You're done picking 'em all up?!<sp:5:1:0>
That was fast!
Talk08_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>You're kidding me, right? You don't have
any rupees? That's hilarious.<sp:5:1:0> Whatever,
I can do it myself.
Talk05_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>I worked so hard to make the <clr:0000><sp:2:e:4a:440043006f006c006c006500630074004f0062006a006500630074005f004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f004d006100780047006f006f00640073004e0075006d00ffff00cd> <clr:ffff>of them,
and now this! <sp:5:0:0>How am I supposed to
gather all these up by myself?!
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh yeah?<sp:5:0:0> Well, that's fine, I can pick 'em
up myself.
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS_00>My seals went flying, but they didn't
scatter that far! <sp:5:0:0>Come back here!
Talk03_3_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>YOU! <sp:5:1:0>How many times is it now?!<sp:5:1:0> Can't
you see I've got a lot on my mind?!<sp:0:4:0>Ugh, you're the worst.<sp:5:0:0> Stop bothering
me already!
Talk09_2_0:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>There's <clr:0000><sp:2:e:4a:440043006f006c006c006500630074004f0062006a006500630074005f004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f004d006100780047006f006f00640073004e0075006d00ffff00cd><clr:ffff> stuffed toys I need you to
gather up for me.<sp:0:4:0>Be sure to load them on the cart nice

Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey, <sp:5:0:0>there are still stuffed toys scattered
all over. <sp:5:0:0>I thought we agreed you'd gather
all <clr:0000><sp:2:e:4a:440043006f006c006c006500630074004f0062006a006500630074005f004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f004d006100780047006f006f00640073004e0075006d00ffff00cd><clr:ffff> of them?<sp:0:4:0>You're not really going to leave them here
